external_games.name: For Honor - Marching Fire Expansion Pack

name: For Honor: Marching Fire Expansion Pack
summary: The Wu Lin Faction is coming! Expand your world with 4 new Heroes instantly- the Tiandi, the Shaolin, the Jiang Jun and the Nuxia. Also get Day 1 access to the new Acade Mode, an endless PVE experience playable solo or co-op with a friend.
